NK039(ti)016:1: +amo bdag ni rang rig ye shes blo dang ma ldan pas //
NK039(ti)016:2: bag med tshul gyi dam la 'gal gyur te //
NK039(ti)016:3: dpal chen he ru ka yi thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK039(ti)016:4: thugs rje che mnga' rnams la bzod par gsol //
NK039(ti)016:5: +amo bdag ni rang rig ye shes bag med tshul
NK039(ti)016:6: gyis dam la ma mo mkha' 'gro thugs dang ci
NK039(ti)016:7: ma sring rgya mtsho'i tshogs la bzod par gsol //
NK039(ti)016:8: gsang sngags rmad byung theg chen rgor zhugs rnams //
NK039(ti)016:9: lta ba 'phang dma' chos nyid don ma rtogs //
NK039(ti)016:10: bsgom pa yun thung yi dam lha ma 'dres //
NK039(ti)016:11: spyod pa brlabs chung yi dam lha ma mnyes //
NK039(ti)016:12: sbyin pa stobs chung ser sna'i mdud pa grol //
NK039(ti)016:13: bsam gtan stobs chung 'dod chags sems ma non //
NK039(ti)016:14: snying rje shugs chung zhe sdang spro ma zhi //
NK039(ti)016:15: shes rab stobs chung gti mug mun ma sel //
NK039(ti)016:16: ma mthong mthong gi lha 'dres bskur btab bam //
NK039(ti)016:17: ma nyes pa la sngags kyi zer thal lam //
NK039(ti)016:18: ma rtogs pa la phur bu'i dbal thal lam //
NK039(ti)016:19: sman med pa la yi dam lha mchod dam //
NK039(ti)016:20: sta na byin gyis ma rlobs gnas 'khyams sam //
NK039(ti)016:21: g+ha na byin gyis ma rlobs rdul khyer ram //
NK039(ti)016:22: dkyil 'khor bri nor mar me 'bar bsad dam //
NK039(ti)016:23: phyi yi 'dul khrims ma bsrungs khrims nyams sam //
NK039(ti)016:24: nang gi dam tshig ma srungs dam nyams sam //
NK039(ti)016:25: bsrung 'tshem ma mchis sdig dang gral cig gam //
NK039(ti)016:26: slob dpon bka' drin gyi bka' bcags gam //
NK039(ti)016:27: grogs mched khyad par can gyi thugs dkrugs sam //
NK039(ti)016:28: dmag chen dpon byas ling chen kha bsgyur ram //
NK039(ti)016:29: chu bsgyur me bkyes sems can srog bcod dam //
NK039(ti)016:30: mtshams med lnga dang de dang nye ba lnga //
NK039(ti)016:31: lci ba bzhi dang log pa brgyad po bcas //
NK039(ti)016:32: de la sogs te nyes sgrib ci mchis pa //
NK039(ti)016:33: 'phags pa mngon sum bzhugs pa'i spyan snga ru //
NK039(ti)016:34: gnong 'gyod yid la dran te mthol zhing bshags //
NK039(ti)016:35: bdag ni sems can lags pa ma rig 'khrul pa bgyi //
NK039(ti)016:36: sgyu ma lags pas gnong pa rjes su bshags //
NK039(ti)016:37: thugs rje chen po bzod pa dang du bzhes //
NK039(ti)016:38: ye shes chen pos tshangs pa rtsal du gsol //
